rules_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast two artifact cards from among them with mana value 3 or less without paying their mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
notes:
https://www.deviantart.com/cobaltplasma/art/Sci-Fi-Forge-858630102


Alt_1:
Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast any number of artifact cards from among them with total mana value 5 or less without paying their mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
